page.title: 05Thornton Lodge Farm
page.content: Thornton Lodge Farm is by the old canal and near to the old railway line. It is a very historical building or lodge with lots of rooms. Part of the Viking Way runs through the land and by the farm there is a nature walk called Spa Trail Thornton Lodge.The farm has 500 acres and in the paddock is a tower that is the remains of an ancient water system fed from a nearby well via a windpump and gravity. Thornton Lodge Farm is close to Thornton village and Garden Farm, which owns a herd of sheep. Thornton village has a phone box, post box and a church. Horncastle canal runs through the area but is now disused.
